comment.author: 23655958@N03
comment._content: There are some very interesting features of this ship. With the spacing of the windows, it looks like the Geronia, a photo of which appears in Willis Metcalfe's book: Canvas & Steam on Quinte Waters, 1968 (see picture section 4th page after page 120). There seems to be a shorter skirt on the upper bow section of the hull, in this version, is the only obvious difference I can see. Here is another view: www.hhpl.on.ca/GreatLakes/GLImages/details.asp?r=vs&I... SS Geronia history as SS Cape Trinity: www.hhpl.on.ca/GreatLakes/Documents/Scanner/02/08/default...
